protocol.text: The RMA algorithm implemented in R package AFFY was used for background correction, normalization and expression calculation. Statistical analysis of the normalized data were performed using R packages LIMMA and RankProd ID_REF =  VALUE = Log2 RMA signal intensity
Dry seeds were used obtained from 18-19 day-old (days after polination) ripe siliques
Plants were grown on soil containing a mixture of substrate and vermiculite (3:1) in growth cabinets (Elbanton BV, Kerkdriel, The Netherlands) in 16h light at 22degreesC and 8h dark at 16degreesC
Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Ambion protocol from 1 ug total RNA (MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced Kit, 2008, Ambion)

After fragmentation, 12.5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained with Fluidics Script FS450_004 in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
